title: (24700) Astorga - 8 Calle la Sequeda
description: Parking to visit the city

title: (24700) Astorga - 80 A-6
description: Good cheap laundry. I parked right outside.

title: (24700) Astorga - 13 Calle Duque Ahumada
description: Park on the street right next to the Mercadona

title: (24700) Astorga - 43 Calle Alcalde Carro Verdejo
description: Large gravel parking lot, illuminated. A billboard with truck driving ban. Very quiet only a few residents park in this square, also very quiet at night. Sights almost in sight.

title: (24700) Astorga - 23 Avenida las Murallas
description: Public parking, right next to the cathedral, a few meters away. Attention! It is a flooded area, so it is recommended not to park in the rainy season. there is a sign indicating it.

title: (24700) Astorga - 15 Plaza Santo Domingo
description: Public parking with about 30 spaces, next to a small church, quite empty, ideal for visiting the cathedral and Gaudí's palace, which are 5 min.

title: (24700) Astorga - Calle Mayuelo
description: Picnic area, with tables, free water fountain, barbecues, grass and trees that provide good shade. Very quiet place. Perfect to eat or stop to rest.

title: (24700) Astorga - 20 Carretera Val de San Lorenzo
title_short: (24700) Astorga - 20 Carretera Val de San Lorenzo
description: Good place to make night, visit the village and with supermarket nearby, picnic area (with fountains), urban gym and playground. No services. We sleep wonderfully.

title: (24700) Astorga - 18 Calle San Roque
description: Public parking, good for visiting the city, very quiet place to spend the night

title: (24700) Astorga - 114 Carretera Sanabria
description: This Aire is located at the bull fighting ring (plaza de toros) so could be busy if bull fights are on. Behind the aire is the local helipad, so during the day you get the occasional helicopter land/take off. The aire itself is on level ground, has a service area (all waters), no issues for long or tall motor homes. Astorga city centre is a 15 min walk away (uphill). It's a popular tourist location as it's on the pilgrim way (Camino de Santiago), has a spectacular roman cathedral (Catedral de Santa María de Astorga), a palace commissioned to Gaudi (Episcopal Palace, Astorga) and an impressive main square. Also, a ten min walk from the aire is the local swimming pool, on Saturdays it has inflatables slides!

title: (24710) San Justo de la Vega - 0 Calle Real
title_short: (24710) San Justo de la Vega - 0 Calle Real
description: Quiet place near Astorga to rest and refresh en route. River beach.

title: (24719) - 5A Carretera de Pandorado
description: Super nice area. River beach, great for a dip in summer. In addition, a beach bar with tables and background music. Ideal to spend an afternoon. I have spent the night in the parking lot, and being civil and clean, you can spend the night. Also, taking a dip in the river first thing in the morning charges your batteries for the whole day. Quite a discovery!

title: (24718) Murias de Rechivaldo - Calle Camino Angosto de Los Carboneros
title_short: (24718) Murias de Rechivaldo - Calle Camino Angosto de Los Carboneros
description: Just a small picnic area. Shadow. Benches. Tables. Water. No other service.

address.street: Calle Camino Angosto de Los Carboneros

title: (24710) San Justo de la Vega - 21B Carretera Astorga
title_short: (24710) San Justo de la Vega - 21B Carretera Astorga
description: Spacious and quiet space with views of the city and picnic tables. Easily accessible by a paved driveway

title: (24395) Nistal - 63 Calle Molino Cela
description: Coincidentally stranded here … there is nothing here except peace and water

title: (24718) Astorga - LE-142
description:
Big parking close to beautiful stone village Castrillo de los polvazares..
Lots of restaurants to eat the famous Maragato food. There's also a lovely bar with live music.
Aloung the pilgrims road Camino de Santiago

title: (24395) Nistal - Unnamed Road
description: On a slight hill with low trees and distant views.

title: (24732) - 5 Lugar Santiago Millas
description: Esplanade next to the church, near the town, to spend a night

title: (24288) Santibáñez de Valdeiglesias - 24 Lugar Santiba/ez Vald
title_short: (24288) Santibáñez de Valdeiglesias - 24 Lugar Santiba/ez Vald
description: Day-night parking on the Camino de Santiago Frances, with drinking water, but without emptying area, illuminated area. Very calm. Its use is prohibited at parties, since it is the venue for them. The baker passes by at noon with his van. Soon I will upload photos of the area. Pleasant walk to the upper town, Valdeiglesias, to see the beautiful Jardín del Brujo and enjoy the good water from its fountain. Area to enjoy good mountain bike routes.

name: Camping Reino de León
title: (24711) Camping Reino de León
description: Camping kingdom of Leon. Economical quiet and large plots

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - LE-142
description: In the middle of nature, to the right as you go from Santa Colomba to Astorga, there is a path, you travel about 100 m, of track, (good to go with the van,) that takes you to an esplanade surrounded by trees and with a stream to the side. Quiet place to spend the night

title: (24717) Val de San Lorenzo - 17 Calle del Caño
title_short: (24717) Val de San Lorenzo - 17 Calle del Caño
description: Quiet square where you can empty the gray in very easy sewers. the baker spends Tuesdays, Thursdays and Saturdays. town without even a bar but walks Pinar y Encinar and other towns nearby.

title: (24280) Benavides de Órbigo - 22H Calle Puente Piedra
title_short: (24280) Benavides de Órbigo - 22H Calle Puente Piedra
description: Next to sports facilities, very quiet, shadow, no services, 4G, bar nearby, next to the city and its services. Upstream there are many villages with "natural" pools, free, grass, picnic, shade.

title: (24280) Benavides de Órbigo - 8 Calle Magisterio Nacional
title_short: (24280) Benavides de Órbigo - 8 Calle Magisterio Nacional
description: Parking in Area with wooden tables and quiet, and central, and there is a cafeteria, Julian bar next door that opens at 7 in the morning and has a good breakfast and with the glasses you get skewers if you want at night you feel the wind and croak of the frogs ....

name: Camping La Ruta del Oro
title: (24722) Camping La Ruta del Oro
description: Small and cheap campsite with electricity and water on the campsite. Very good bar and reastaurant attached. The owner is very friendly.

name: Camping D Suero De Quiñones
title: (24286) Camping D Suero De Quiñones
description: Camping D Suero De Quiñones

title: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 8 Calle Doctor Basilio López
title_short: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 8 Calle Doctor Basilio López
description: Parking in the urban area, next to a park and the town center, with supermarkets, restaurants, etc. Next to it passes a train track with little night traffic. You can spend the night without problems. On Friday mornings there is a market in the center of town and this is the car park that people use that day. It is a town with atmosphere in summer and various activities.

title: (24286) Hospital de Órbigo - 4 Avenida Suero de Quiñones
title_short: (24286) Hospital de Órbigo - 4 Avenida Suero de Quiñones
description: Large parking lot with shade and recreational area where we were parked during the medieval festival of the Fair. Next to a restaurant and pools

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - C. Antonio Perez Crespo
title_short: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - C. Antonio Perez Crespo
description: Quiet place to spend the night just behind a residence for the elderly next to a very large esplanade maragato craft center

title: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 45J Avenida el Páramo
title_short: (24350) Veguellina de Órbigo - 45J Avenida el Páramo
description: Great parking to spend day and night. On the banks of the Órbigo river with a shaded area, tables, park, sports area, municipal swimming pool, barbecues, public bathrooms ... etc. Fantastic bar Restaurant next door. A visit is recommended in summer to go down the river by canoe, with a local company, open pools and a beautiful river. Trout fishing area. Exceptional place. No emptying service.

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - 115 LE-142
description: Quiet place to spend the night next to a village with a pharmacy and a bar / restaurant nearby. Next to a shady poplar area for picnics.

title: (24730) Destriana - 32 Calle Destriana
description: Located between the LE-133 and the Rio Duerna, the free parking of the municipal swimming pool is accessible to all sizes. Stabilized, level and far enough from the road not to suffer the nuisance there are however no specific services for motorhomes. Maybe in season the toilets are available. 10 minutes from the center of Destriana, this parking lot is quiet and pleasant. Optimal satellite and 4G reception.

title: (24356) Villazala - 1014 Lugar San Pelayo
description: Give us a very quiet night completely alone. Very pleasant environment on the banks of the Orbigo River and with a great river poscina. During the day in the summer months it is full of people, especially on weekends. Eye!. Do not follow the directions of Google GPS. It takes you to the opposite side of the river and there is no access. To get there you have to reach the village of Villoria de Orbigo and cross it. There are some indicative signs, but they are not very clear. When in doubt better ask.

title: (24285) Quintanilla del Monte -
description: Small paved area next to the road. It has a water spout (without thread and with a very large pipe), a couple of picnic tables and a container.

title: (24721) Castrillo de la Valduerna - 66 Carretera Tabuyo
title_short: (24721) Castrillo de la Valduerna - 66 Carretera Tabuyo
description: Picnic area with small bar / fast food restaurant.

name: Campo Santa Marina del Rey
title: (24393) Campo Santa Marina del Rey
description:
Santa Marina del Rey, 21 Avenida Polideportivo.
Camping Ruviejo! Swimming pool, with mandatory bathing caps, free for campers (ask for the ticket at the campsite reception), entrance at the end of the shaded terrace of the bar. Attention opening reception of the campsite, closed between 2 p.m. and 4 p.m. Shaded pitches, clean and beautiful sanitary facilities, showers. Internet connection only at reception.

title: (24717) Luyego de Somoza - Travesía Iglesia
description: Great location in the heart of the Maragatos people. Calm night. Opposite the hotel restaurant, with the possibility of WiFi with a drink.

title: (24722) Rabanal del Camino - 28 Calle Real
description: Very quiet and clean place on the Camino de Santiago. if you dirty something or leave garbage there is a man who passes by every day and you can get a good one, if you are respectful and discreet, without problems to spend the night.

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - 25 LE-142
description: Parking on the grass at the end of the village, on the Camino Frances (French Way). We stayed the night and it was calm, we were two campers

title: (24717) Quintanilla de Somoza - C. Arriba
description: Dirt parking very close to the river. It has tables and benches to eat.

title: (24397) Villameca -
description: Magnificent view of the lake, possibility of swimming, sleeping on site, a very nice place for the night

title: (24369) Villagatón - LE-5304
description: It is a service area of Cepsa. It has an area for motorhomes where you can only empty gray water and fill with water. For black deposits, you can ask in the toilets of the gas station. Very large parking space useful for overnight stays. Next door there is another cheap petrol station.

title: (24397) Donillas - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful. Wonderfully calm. Great view of the lake. We're standing. We stayed 2 days (midweek). Also paradise for dogs. All happy :-)

title: (24397) Quintana del Castillo - LE-450
description: Swamp surrounded by forest with chiringuitos and pedal boats for rent, ideal for swimming and sleeping

title: (24369) Villagatón - LE-450
description: Cepsa gas station service area. You cannot discharge black water.

title: (24721) - Calle los Molinos
description: Very nice area to spend the night without services. Next to lake, with nice picnic area. Perfect to rest.

title: (24750) La Bañeza - 4 Carretera León
description: Parking in front of the sports center, flat and quiet area. Pools next door and a DIA supermarket, we slept without problems.

name: Camping Vía de la Plata
title: (24750) Camping Vía de la Plata
description: Camping via de la plata, 10 min from the center of la bañeza, there is a supermarket at 800m, The campsite is very well very clean and with a very attentive staff. It has a small pool but to stick a bath the bill, the bar makes a very good paella

name: Puente Paulón
title: (24763) Puente Paulón
description: River beach next to La Bañeza, with a beach bar and grills, perfect for sleeping peacefully and taking a bath in the Orbigo River.

title: (24733) Quintanilla de Flórez -
description: Picturesque typical village of León. Parking in front of the village bar. Shadow possibility. Very quiet since, although close to the road, there is very little circulation.

title: (24722) Foncebadón - Calle Real
description: Next to the house. A very quiet place at the entrance of the city. Without services.

title: (24722) Foncebadón -
description: Parking next to the road with amazing views. Road is not busy.It is suitable for vans and smaller motorhomes (up to 6m). Gets busy during weekend.It is uneven, might need to use wedges, we didn't. We walked Camino from here. Amazing pizza in the village. NB! road ahead is passable for smaller motorhomes and vans only! It's very scenic but narrow, especially going through the village El Acebo.

title: (24722) Foncebadón - 63 Calle Real
description: We parked one night in this small hamlet located on the Camino de Santiago road. There are a few bars and hostel. This is not an official car park, but we only stayed one night without a problem.

title: (24270) Carrizo de la Ribera - 50 Calle la Campaza
title_short: (24270) Carrizo de la Ribera - 50 Calle la Campaza
description: Parking without services. Quiet night Very close to the municipal swimming pools and next to the river. Lots of shade, playground and good location for a walk around the city ...... highly recommended "strawberry and chocolate".

title: (24767) Santa Elena de Jamuz - 1014 Lugar Jimenez Jamu
title_short: (24767) Santa Elena de Jamuz - 1014 Lugar Jimenez Jamu
description: Parking between the football field and the sports center. Day and night. Picnic area next door. Cellars and chic vestiges.

title: (24767) Santa Elena de Jamuz - 124 Calle Carretera
title_short: (24767) Santa Elena de Jamuz - 124 Calle Carretera
description: Shaded and quiet parking, for overnight transit

title: (24270) Carrizo de la Ribera - 17 Calle las Eras
title_short: (24270) Carrizo de la Ribera - 17 Calle las Eras
description: Gray and black water emptying, city water filling

name: Camping Camino de Santiago
title: (24392) Camping Camino de Santiago
description: Camping Camino de Santiago (2 *) It has a lot of shade, large plots and with water. It has a pool and 5 minutes walk from the town

title: (24722) Santa Colomba de Somoza - LE-142
description: Parking, gravel on a meadow, garbage cans and picnic tables available.

title: (24370) Torre del Bierzo - 8C Camino Canal
description: New public motorhome area that has just opened. Quiet place to spend a few days, clean bathrooms and very nice swimming pools.

title: (24397) Quintana del Castillo - 24 Calle la Peña
title_short: (24397) Quintana del Castillo - 24 Calle la Peña
description:
Beautiful view point :)
Here are benches, a rubbish bin and even a water tap :)

Good spot for a break ;)

title: (24271) Llamas de la Ribera - 30 Calle la Barca
title_short: (24271) Llamas de la Ribera - 30 Calle la Barca
description: River pool with playground for children and sports fields. Very calm. Bar open in summer.

title: (24272) Cimanes del Tejar - 18 Avenida Río Órbigo
title_short: (24272) Cimanes del Tejar - 18 Avenida Río Órbigo
description:
A place just a little further than the parking of the public recreational area.
Here you are located directly by the river, with perfect access to it. 
Perfect for those who like it a little bit more quiet. 
Suitable for one or at most two vans or smaller motorhomes. The ground is quite flat.
No services here, but you can use the facilities of the public area, which is only a 200 metres walk.

title: (24272) Cimanes del Tejar - 18 Avenida Río Órbigo
title_short: (24272) Cimanes del Tejar - 18 Avenida Río Órbigo
description: Cimanes del Tejar public park. Next to the Orbigo river. River beach, sports center, swimming pools, Las Cañas bar. Public toilets, no electricity, no water change.

title: (24378) San Facundo - LE-5321
description: Nice town to visit, quiet place with a restaurant bar and a Flubial beach, there are several routes to do. You have to ask for permission to the number that appears in the photo to check availability. It even has a covered picnic area with a barbecue.

title: (24378) Torre del Bierzo - LE-5321
description: Nice town with a river beach, Wi-Fi internet connection, hiking trails, parking suitable for motorhomes with the possibility of drinking water with a normal tap, unlimited overnight stays, a very good Bar-Restaurant. You cannot access the town with tourism. The town's water source is great.

title: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 12 Calle la Canal
title_short: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 12 Calle la Canal
description: Parking on Calle12 street. Water. Drain. Toilet. Sports Center. Municipal pool and spa. Dominical market so street turns into market. Closed on Mondays

title: (24271) Llamas de la Ribera - 53 Calle Camping
title_short: (24271) Llamas de la Ribera - 53 Calle Camping
description: Recreation area with tennis court, mini golf, playgrounds, two bars .. right on the river with possibility of bath. Swimming pool with showers and toilets. Two small bars. Cheap beer

title: (24392) Villar de Mazarife -
description: Grassy area next to a small pond, along the way to Santiago de Compostela with a drinking water point. No direct access to the grass by vehicle but access to the path which borders it and which therefore gives directly to the area. Very pleasant. Road with little traffic

title: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 7 Avenida de Asturias
title_short: (24240) Santa María del Páramo - 7 Avenida de Asturias
description: Ample parking for the supermarket, places with no height limit.

title: (24317) Torre del Bierzo - 4A Calle Huerta Nueva
title_short: (24317) Torre del Bierzo - 4A Calle Huerta Nueva
description: Parking of the old mine, flat, pleasant place, but without any service.

title: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - 8A Calle Número 8 Folgoso Ribera
title_short: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - 8A Calle Número 8 Folgoso Ribera
description: Esplanade near the cemetery. Quiet place to spend the night, without services. Great place to see the stars, sunset and sunrise. Charming village and full of routes.

title: (24375) Igüeña - 6 LE-460
description: Motorhome area Pobladura de las Regueras.

title: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - Calle Número Dos
title_short: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - Calle Número Dos
description: Small parking just after the bridge, left, for one to two vans or small motorhomes. Nice stream, unfortunately inaccessible. On the other hand, you can go down to the reach of the old mill. Clear water, just enough to soak your feet!

title: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - Calle Número 27 Folgoso Ribera
title_short: (24311) Folgoso de la Ribera - Calle Número 27 Folgoso Ribera
description: Tables and barbecues, ample parking and a children's play area. Next to a dam for bathing and from there hiking trails start. A very pretty town.

title: (24414) Carracedo de Compludo - 4 Calle Iglesia
description: Parking area at the entrance of the town. Very quiet place. No services.

title: (24312) Boeza - 20 Calle Río Boeza
description: Quiet and pleasant place next to the Boeza River

title: (24312) Folgoso de la Ribera - CV-127-1
description: Place from the top of the town of Boeza

title: (24391) Valverde de la Virgen - Área de descanso
title_short: (24391) Valverde de la Virgen - Área de descanso
description: Right off the road with 2 picnic tables and some shade. To eat and sleep a little great.

title: (24735) Castrocontrigo - 53T Calle Río Ería
description: A small place away from the town near the river where nobody told us anything, we spent the day there and took the opportunity to buy Santocildes chocolate that is very good

title: (24414) Ponferrada - Unnamed Road
description: La Herrería de Compludo car park. Close to very little traveled road. Very quiet, you can visit the smithy.

title: (24413) El Acebo de San Miguel - 2 LE-142
title_short: (24413) El Acebo de San Miguel - 2 LE-142
description: Entering the dirt road on the left there is grass after the playground. We slept one night there with good views of the sunset and the town very quiet. In the town there are two or three hostels that offer bar service, we ate in one.

title: (24413) El Acebo de San Miguel - 2 Travesía Peña
title_short: (24413) El Acebo de San Miguel - 2 Travesía Peña
description: Wide almost flat area. Good panoramic to the west. Near a great hostel. Everyone sleeps soon.

title: (24300) Bembibre - Paseo de la Devesa
description: Stadium parking. Wide and a little sloping. There are no services. Good shade in summer. We stopped to rest a while and you couldn't hear the road.

title: (24791) Roperuelos del Páramo - 2 Calle Carretera de Valderas
title_short: (24791) Roperuelos del Páramo - 2 Calle Carretera de Valderas
description: Small river pool ideal for cooling off during the trip, do not stay overnight but I don't think there is any problem

title: (24300) Bembibre - 4 Avenida Manuel Arroyo Quiñónez
description: Parking of an institute of land and well leveled. One step away from the municipal swimming pools, the heated ones, pavilion and a playground. A five minute walk from the center of Bembibre and very close to the exit of the national highway. Recommended for a quiet night

title: (24300) Bembibre - 43 Calle Eloy Reigada
description: Self-service laundry open 365 days, from 8:30 a.m. to 10:00 p.m.

title: (24312) Igüeña - 1 Paseo el Catoute
description: Quiet place next to the Boeza river.

title: (24738) Cunas - Calle Padazo
description: Picnic area with barbecues, tables and drinking water fountain.

title: (24318) Bembibre - 4 Calle los Alores
description: Perfect parking to rest. Quiet site. Very close to the A-6 and N-6 road with a good bar and cheap restaurants one at the end of the beautiful street. Playground. Very shady Water sources. Next to the medical center. perfect for a rest or a quiet night.

title: (24251) Banuncias - 5T Calle Comercio
description: A place with trees where you can park the van in the shade in front of it there is a pool and a bar until 1 o'clock, music was played but a quiet place to spend the night.

title: (49619) Ayoó de Vidriales - Unnamed Road
description: recreational area, beach in small reservoir on the other side, access track by the dam. very quiet, signal forbidden to camp, but we slept without problems in AC in November. In summer I suppose they open the bar and services. Movistar no Vodafone coverage

title: (24230) Valdevimbre - 12 Travesía Calvo Sotelo
description: Village recreation area. Next to a small lake with ducks. Most of the tables are in the sun. Very quiet area. We haven't gotten to sleep but I don't think there would be a problem.

title: (24319) Bembibre - 32 Calle Cristo Labaniegos
description: Parking area in a beautiful green area of the wonderful town of Labanego. Perfect for campers. Next door you have a bar-terrace La Casa Mágica.

title: (24230) Valdevimbre - 7 Calle de Manuel Cadenas
description: Soccer field parking. Small town for gastronomic visit. Variety of restaurants located underground in what were once the wineries.

title: (24132) Riello - 4 Carretera Villablino
description: Very quiet environment next to the bathing area of the Omaña River. A beautiful and little known area of the mountain of Leon. Omaña y Luna Valley Biosfera Reserve.

title: (24318) - Unnamed Road
description: We have only stopped to drink but there are many trucks and some van. Hostel with bathrooms and showers (paid service). It looks good to be a good place to spend the night.

title: (24275) Rioseco de Tapia - 1 Avenida el Valle
title_short: (24275) Rioseco de Tapia - 1 Avenida el Valle
description: Very quiet and level parking area. It is in the center of town, where you can buy bread, bars / restaurants and a large sports area with a football and basketball field.

title: (24318) San Román de Bembibre -
description: Drinking water Space for 1 camper

title: (24740) - 74A Avenida Tomas Sastre
description: Picnic area and recreation area of Trucha. beautiful but tiny, with beautiful stream. There are four wooden tables and two barbecues. No water or trash. Football goals ... nice and quiet city with basic services ... there are no shadows, but in these regions, the sun is welcome! Attention: cow dung everywhere! There is a height limit when entering!

title: (24415) Peñalba de Santiago -
description: Abandoned ski resort on the mountain peak! Lovely views and a great night sky, we slept one night with no problems.

title: (24233) Adanero - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
title_short: (24233) Adanero - Autovía Ruta de la Plata
description: Stop en route on the a66 off the road.

title: (24413) Molinaseca - 10 Calle Salgueras
description: Nice parking lot in Molinaseca, with gray water and water intake. also garbage. The excursion to the bridges and a bath in the natural pools are highly recommended.

title: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 512 Avenida Párroco Pablo Diez
title_short: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 512 Avenida Párroco Pablo Diez
description: Express laundromat in the mall Leclerc (open until 22h). Campsites cars can park in the car park no limit in height. No night parking allowed.

title: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 123 Lugar Trobajo Camino
title_short: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 123 Lugar Trobajo Camino
description: Quiet park on the outskirts. It is reached from Trobajo del Camino by 600m of a dirt path. At 1.5 km from the Islaleon water park, we went with a bicycle along roads and some part through secondary streets. There is also a delicious bakery nearby, the Velilla bakery, on a street parallel to the soccer field. At night there was a dog barking, but we had no problem. there is quite a lot of shade. there are also some picnic tables and some swings but they are poorly maintained

title: (24413) Molinaseca - 12 Travesía Manuel Fraga
description: Alternative parking to the Molina seca area. some noise from the road and pilgrims leaving early. otherwise well 1km from the town center with free access soccer field and tennis court.

title: (24415) Peñalba de Santiago -
description: Very nice location, parking provided by the village. 3 car parks follow one another, plenty of choice. Anyway, access to the village is forbidden to all vehicles ... Very quiet, breathtaking view.

title: (24415) Peñalba de Santiago - 2 Calle Real Paseo
title_short: (24415) Peñalba de Santiago - 2 Calle Real Paseo
description: Peñalba de Santiago, splendid place for hiking and enjoy one of the most beautiful villages in Spain. Very cautious with the access, the vans will not have any problem but the motorhomes because of the access of the paved road do not pass in width nor in height, it is necessary to take the route of forest track, road about 8km without asphalt, but we arrive safely, Attention: always in dry weather, it does not pass in case of rain or snow. We can sleep without problem.

title: (24398) Almazcara -
description: Almazcara municipal swimming pools. Level parking right next to the pools. Good place to spend a day with the family, have a drink or take a shower (paying admission) Adult €1.20 Children €0.80. At the pool bar there are sandwiches, pizzas and cold drinks. Hours from 11:30 to 21:00. Bathing cap necessary.

name: Parking Area de León
title: (24391) Parking Area de León
description: A very quiet area to spend the night. It has everything you need for the motorhome (electricity, dirty water drain...) Carlos and Miguel are very attentive at all times. Small playground and outdoor dining area. One night with 2 adults and 2 girls 17 euros. We will definitely come back!

name: Camping De Noceda
title: (24319) Camping De Noceda
description: Nice and spacious place, this campsite was not in the application, I just added it, details need to be confirmed and include a photo, from the town there are several mountain routes, with medicinal sources, waterfalls and a beautiful viewpoint, there are pools , soccer field, bars and restaurants etc ,, About the campsite, many details need to be confirmed, such as number of parking spaces, price (if there is one) and many other things ,,

title: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 85 Avenida el Romeral
title_short: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 85 Avenida el Romeral
description: It's just over. Avda. Romeral, 85 of San Andrés de Rabanedo (León). Next to the San Andrés pool. The area has 8 easily accessible parking spaces.

title: (49340) Justel, Zamora - Unnamed Road
description: away from the road landscaped land near a pond. Several picnic tables, barbecue, fountain. lots of space and flat terrain. very quiet at the beginning of April, passage of a few morning hunters with dogs...

title: (24761) Alija del Infantado - 22 Plaza Mayor
description: We came to this town because they told us that they were doing a day of children's activities and it was a success. There is a fairy forest, they organized a play with goblins and there was a nightly bonfire for children. Brutal. They told us that the city council allows overnight stays in the entire town and we slept behind the castle. Our little boy was delighted and the people of the town were super welcoming, especially Eva, the organizer of the children's play day (she even offered us a cable so that we could connect to the current in her house. We didn't need it). Thank you!!!

title: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 6-101 Calle los Picones
title_short: (24010) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 6-101 Calle los Picones
description: ISLA LEON, the enclosure and the parking lot do not give much confidence because of what it looks like, something that has been neglected for my taste, but inside, everything is fine without much luxury, but well . !! ADVICE !! Ideal to spend 1 day of swimming with toboggans. Pools, barbecues.

title: (24398) San Miguel de Las Dueñas -
description: Parking next to the Cistercian monastery of San Miguel De Las Dueñas, flat and quiet, it has three bars nearby, in one of them you have lunch or dinner, two shops, a pharmacy, you can park there to go to the path of the stonecutters, A very nice environment. There is a children's park just opposite. And everything is very well lit. It is very quiet.

title: (24123) Carrocera - LE-420
description: Selga reservoir. Next to road and highway, but quiet. Small jetty area. With garbage and a small booth (if it rains). Somewhat left area, but perfect for picnic on pier.

title: (24740) Truchas - Calle Piñedo-Tl
description: Quiet place with benches and tables, next to a very, very little traveled road

title: (24234) Villamañán - CL-621
description: Gas station with highly recommended restaurant, home cooking and rich

title: (24414) Ponferrada - 46 Calle San Juan
description: Parking next to a church, very quiet, space to spare and incredible sunset.

title: (24133) Murias de Paredes - 1 Plaza Juan Rubio
title_short: (24133) Murias de Paredes - 1 Plaza Juan Rubio
description: Parking in the Fasgar square, a place for about 6 motorhomes, a quiet place and a good starting point for mountain routes, the forgotten path passes through here. There are no bars open, except in August. In the town festivals (July 25) the square is occupied

title: (24234) Laguna de Negrillos - 19 Calle el Jardín
title_short: (24234) Laguna de Negrillos - 19 Calle el Jardín
description: Area with drinking water, gray / black, wastebaskets. Located next to the 12th century castle. Quiet and safe to spend the night. The town deserves a walk. In the eco-sanitary areas and points they are for the exclusive use of motorhomes and campers. Tourism Law of the Junta de Castilla y León. You cannot remove any camping elements such as tables, chairs, awning and leveling wedges.

title: (24234) Laguna de Negrillos - 13 Calle Santa Cruz
title_short: (24234) Laguna de Negrillos - 13 Calle Santa Cruz
description: Very quiet place, clean and easily accessible esplanade near the motorhome area. Ideal to spend one night

title: (24398) Congosto - 18 Avenida El Campo
description: Quiet area next to a football field and stone tables two minutes from the Barcena peat bog and great views. Village with bar and restaurant.

title: (24398) Congosto - 6 Calle el Ayuntamiento
description: Nice picnic place

title: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 290D CL-623
description: Parking for vehicles very clean and quiet located next to restaurant, with picnic area and playground. Only parking without services. A few km from León

title: (24120) La Magdalena -
description: La Magdalena area and eco-sanitary point for the use of motorhomes and campers, very quiet, leveled next to the municipal swimming pools and the Luna river, there are shops and restaurants nearby and a very pleasant, spectacular views...Easy access by the entrance to the city after the building materials store, on the other side passage under a vaulted bridge sometimes difficult because of the parking area

title: (24192) Trobajo del Cerecedo - S/N Calle Calvo Sotelo
title_short: (24192) Trobajo del Cerecedo - S/N Calle Calvo Sotelo
description: Very quiet place day and night with shaded children's play area

title: (24398) Congosto - Avenida de Posada del Río
title_short: (24398) Congosto - Avenida de Posada del Río
description: Quiet and beautiful place to spend a night (and the day) quietly. The Bárcena Reservoir is a 5 'walk away. About three vans fit. When we came we were alone and it was great!

title: (24120) Soto y Amío - 2A Avenida la Magdalena
title_short: (24120) Soto y Amío - 2A Avenida la Magdalena
description: Stop on the road in a quiet village by the river and garden with wooden benches. You can take a short walk along the banks of the Luna river with information about birds, wildlife and vegetation. Safe place to sleep as there are houses, a pharmacy, a medical center, a bar-restaurant and a fountain.

title: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 10 Calle Cartago
title_short: (24191) San Andrés del Rabanedo - 10 Calle Cartago
description: Apartment next to a shopping center, quiet place to spend the night free and without noise.

title: (24010) León - Calle Cronista Luis Pastrana
description: Always empty parking lot Large north of the city by the Bernesga river.

title: (24010) León - 5 Calle Truchillas
description: NEW LAUNDRY, WITH GREAT CAPACITY MACHINES AND VERY GOOD CLEANING PRODUCTS. We were delighted, the owner was there and very kindly explained everything to us.

title: (24398) Toreno - Unnamed Road
description: Beautiful site in the Ermita de la Peña, ideal for a quiet place to spend the night. There is no water. Picnic tables in the shade.

title: (24740) Truchas - Calle Piñedo-Tl
description: Picnic area in Truchillas. It has a large level parking lot and three stone tables to eat. In addition, the tables have a small slate roof to produce a small shade.

title: (24008) León - Avenida de Peregrinos.
description: Parking for Caravans 48hrs free. but no Toilettes, Showers, no Washing machine. OK for parking only

title: (24120) Soto y Amío - CL-626
description: Nice and comfortable place next to the river. I slept one night. And the next morning I fished very early.

title: (24398) Congosto - Calle el Pantano
description: Small recreational area, difficult leveling, no services, 4G, bath in reservoir, shade, very quiet.

title: (24740) Truchas - Calle Piñedo-Tl
description: Picnic area with picnic areas and shadows next to the river, in front of the ascent to the lake of trout

title: (24149) Vega de Caballeros - CL-626
description: Nice and large resting room enough for 5 motorhomes at least. You can beneath the beautiful sight of the forests and mountains lying on the overside.

title: (24493) Toreno - Unnamed Road
description: Very quiet and very spacious place. You can park in various areas. It is in the middle of nature, there is no service. Ideal for those looking for tranquility. It is reached by dirt road with quite a bump. Attention. Not recommended in rain !!!

title: (24149) Mora de Luna -
description: Pretty abandoned picnic area with tables. shade, flat, calm, swim in a dammed river but water at 11.4° in July, poplars.

title: (24123) Carrocera - 4 Calle de la Constitución
description: Playground with a place next to the main street. Super careful.

title: (24620) Cuadros - 22D Calle Real
description: New Motorhome Area, in Cuadros, near León, is already working, next to it there are public swimming pools, I have already spent the night there,

title: (24620) Cuadros - 195 Calle Real
description: Place enabled with a concrete floor for the celebration of patron saint festivities. We have been sleeping 2 nights and without a problem, very quiet behind it there is a picnic area under some poplars and a soccer field that is open to the general public. We were in Area AC below but too much inclination. Nearby there is a Miami bar that is very good. It is worth discovering the roads and mountains of this municipality. Thank you, Marcos, mayor of the Cuadros town hall.

title: (24123) Carrocera - 27 Lugar Carrocera
description: Picnic area near the town of Carrocera, where there are tables to eat and a small fountain of drinking water. In which we can rest peacefully with space to park.

title: (24797) San Adrián del Valle - 17C Calle José Antonio Cabañeros
title_short: (24797) San Adrián del Valle - 17C Calle José Antonio Cabañeros
description: A very quiet and simple town. surrounded by excavated cellars for private use, for more than 200 years. This area was dedicated to wine, the whole land was made up of vines. The neighbors are very friendly and some sell products from the garden: eggs, potatoes etc. The camper area has electricity, water and a laundry room that has been converted into a children's pool, children's area and a river where you can see crabs and fish . Very nice. Bar 100 meters away, possibility of meals, prior reservation, paellas, portions ... good prices, ask at the bar.

title: (24148) Los Barrios de Luna - 18B Calle Real
title_short: (24148) Los Barrios de Luna - 18B Calle Real
description: Asphalt parking, flat, no services, very quiet place with the marsh dam next door and hiking trails. ATTENTION, if you arrive by the marshy part, do not enter the first entrance, there is a VERY narrow street. Go down to the end and take the main entrance

title: (24123) León - 1008 Lugar Santiago Villas
description:
Picnic area with two picnic areas between trees. A hose and a fountain. There is also a BBQ area.

There is no sign that prohibits or allows anything.

There is a shed with a plug and two spotlights available. The booth must be a toilet, but the door is closed (at least in spring, which is this date).

There is a small mobility area for older people and a swing for children.

title: (24123) Carrocera - 3 Calle Real
description: Small with a lot of charm and possibility of excursions and climbing. The access road is narrow but we have climbed without problems with a 7.8m long AC

title: (24148) Los Barrios de Luna - 10 CL-626
description: Place with beautiful views. We were quietly eating and spending the afternoon without any problem. There is no passing cars or anything.

title: (49622) Cunquilla de Vidriales -
description: Small car park well set back from the motorable track. Possible to go there with a heavy weight and enough room to maneuver (for us 12T and 9m long). Nice view, super quiet place to spend a completely isolated night. Fairly flat terrain. We were not disturbed. No service apart from a trash can; you have to be completely independent.

title: (49622) Granucillo - Unnamed Road
description: Desert area change of scenery assured, accessible by a track. no service, no shadow zone.

title: (24148) Los Barrios de Luna - Calle Corrida
title_short: (24148) Los Barrios de Luna - Calle Corrida
description: rest area. with picnic tables in the shade. We stopped to eat, a wonder!

title: (49780) Pobladura del Valle - 1 Calle St Tomas
title_short: (49780) Pobladura del Valle - 1 Calle St Tomas
description: Next to typical cellars. No problem of space. anywhere is allowed day or night. don't miss the cellar The Grotto. great sirloin steak and nice wine and atmosphere. good place in the way to Galicia or Portugal.

title: (24147) Mirantes de Luna - Cl-626
description: Just a standard water tap at the side of the road, facing the yacht club. Very nice road by the way.

title: (24148) Mallo de Luna -
description: Quite wide cliff, 2 vans fit easily. You can see the whole lake from above. We were alone and very calm

title: (49693) Morales de Rey - 2 Calle el Puente
title_short: (49693) Morales de Rey - 2 Calle el Puente
description: Wonderful and quiet place to spend the night or spend some day. The area belongs to the Ruta Raia Norte (the first cross-border route for motorhomes in Europe) with the support of the Castilian and Leonese motorhome association (ACYLA). It has 8 parking spaces, gray water emptying area and terminal for water change. black, in addition, drinking water can be recharged, somewhat cumbersome to be able to carry out the entire process. Good routes for walking and mountain biking. Grocery store bakery and bar, very close. Located in the urban area of the town.

title: (49319) Otero de Centenos -
description: This is the parking place for the picnic area that is just 50 meters away, crossing the Río Negro. This car park is well signposted, wide and level for motorhomes and GV vans. In the picnic area you can also access by car, but it is more uneven. There are picnic areas, a fountain and routes that leave from the same car park. The route of the mills, recommended.

title: (24148) Mallo de Luna -
description: Nice spot with a superb view of the lake. Quiet and protected by a few shrubs. Access is quite easy by stone and dirt path for a van type vehicle. the land has a few flat areas to land quietly and spend the night. Next to it is a small, very quiet cove on the lake.

title: (24147) Los Barrios de Luna - 53 CL-626
description: On the banks of the Barrio de Luna Reservoir, you enter from the highway, it is a dirt road made by cars and with pebbles, which makes transit much easier.  At the beginning there are bushes and a couple of trees and the road is narrow. But it is worth it. In the middle of winter I do not know if it is a good idea, because this area is snowy and the same is a mud. It is very pleasant and a very splendid air runs.

title: (49326) Valleluengo -
description: Hermitage of San Mamés. Access is indicated, and is done through a dirt track that starts from the outskirts of the town of Santa Eulalia del Río Negro. The course is about 1500m along the track, but it is in good condition for light vans. AC and GV I do not recommend.

title: (49331) Vega de Tera - Unnamed Road
description: Flat space for about 2 vans surrounded by more or less abandoned fields. Small artificial water reservoir right next to it. Close to the motorway but very quiet, access via a road suitable for compacted gravel without difficulty.

title: (49331) Vega de Tera - Diseminado Diseminados
description: Quiet place surrounded by fields, road accesible for vans

title: (49622) Quintanilla de Urz - Unnamed Road
description: Rest area with restaurant and gas station right next door. The restaurant has a shower service. Hot water without problem, correct.

title: (49622) Quintanilla de Urz - Autovia Rías Bajas Km
title_short: (49622) Quintanilla de Urz - Autovia Rías Bajas Km
description: Parking at the restaurant where also truck drivers stay overnight. No problem for one night. Good and cheap food and drink. Inside very clean. No disposal, water etc.

title: (24145) Sena de Luna - Calle Real
description: Parking with picnic area and river with swimming area. Without service. Nice views. Calm environment. Night prohibited on the coast.

name: Camping Río Luna
title: (24145) Camping Río Luna
description:
Sena de Luna, Calle Real.
Family camping in the mountains
quiet great location
nature and discovery
hiking and mountain biking

title: (49622) Quintanilla de Urz - 15 A-52
description: Parking between trucks behind 24h restaurant / gas station. Fresh bread available. Standard gas station store. No facilities although toilets and possibly also a shower (key?)

title: (49326) - 37 Diseminado Diseminados
description: Picnic area with several level tables and benches. We spent a night, calm.

title: (24146) Sena de Luna - LE-3418
description: Next to the lake. Near populated area with restaurant, caldas de luna, but very quiet with the full view is a spectacular site

title: (49326) Rionegro del Puente - 51 N-525
description: fountain

title: (49625) Santibáñez de Tera - unnamed road
description: Large, quiet forest/area with several picnic tables. Direct access to hiking trails. The place is easy to reach.

title: (24146) Sena de Luna - LE-3418
description: Quiet place to stop to eat, sleep nap even overnight. I do not think there is a problem. It's next to the swamp. There is no service at all.

title: (49626) Santa Croya de Tera - 30 Calle Prado
title_short: (49626) Santa Croya de Tera - 30 Calle Prado
description: Nice area to stop. Land not paved but fairly flat. Very quiet at night. The swimming pool on the river is magnificent. Very popular place for locals to spend the afternoon. Nearby there is a bar, a butcher and a small grocery store.

title: (49332) Camarzana de Tera - ZA-105
description: Picnic area next to the river.

title: (24145) Sena de Luna - 68 CL-626
description: Apartment near the road, but with little traffic and quiet. There are no picnic tables.

title: (24145) San Emiliano -
description: Small area next to the river, for a couple of cars between the towns of Babia and La Luna, next to the road but quiet. Ideal for a rest stop.

title: (24143) Riolago - 2 Calle Real
description: At the entrance of Riolago, village flat ground for about 50 cars, with picnic tables. Plans for routes in the region Bavia.

title: (24142) Mena de Babia - 12 Camino Monte
description: Picnic area in Mena de Babia. Tables, barbecue spot, children playground, water tap and natural swimmingpoll. Very beautiful and quiet spot.

title: (24143) Huergas de Babia - 2 Camino Riolago
description: Motorhome parking area, in the Natural Park of Babia and Luna, a magical setting to enjoy Montihuero, Ubiña rock, Green Lagoon, Lagoon river Chao Sil Moon sources, the reservoir of Barrios de Luna and innumerable corners where time will make you dream.
